00029 namespace thrust

00031 
00092 template<typename System = use_default>
00093   class discard_iterator
00094     : public detail::discard_iterator_base<System>::type
00095 {
00098     friend class thrust::experimental::iterator_core_access;
00099     typedef typename detail::discard_iterator_base<System>::type          super_t;
00100     typedef typename detail::discard_iterator_base<System>::incrementable incrementable;
00101     typedef typename detail::discard_iterator_base<System>::base_iterator base_iterator;
00102 
00103   public:
00104     typedef typename super_t::reference  reference;
00105     typedef typename super_t::value_type value_type;
00106 
00114     __host__ __device__
00115     discard_iterator(discard_iterator const &rhs)
00116       : super_t(rhs.base()) {}
00117 
00125     __host__ __device__
00126     discard_iterator(incrementable const &i = incrementable())
00127       : super_t(base_iterator(i)) {}
00128 
00132   private: // Core iterator interface
00133     __host__ __device__
00134     reference dereference(void) const
00135     {
00136       return reference();
00137     }
00138 
00141 }; // end constant_iterator
00142 
00143 
00153 inline __host__ __device__
00154 discard_iterator<> make_discard_iterator(discard_iterator<>::difference_type i = discard_iterator<>::difference_type(0))
00155 {
00156   return discard_iterator<>(i);
00157 } // end make_discard_iterator()
